meanings.definition: Tinged with a slight amount of color or flavor.
meanings.sent1: The sky was tincted with a soft pink hue as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was tincted with a delicate shade of lavender.
meanings.sent3: The cake was tincted with a surprising burst of lemon flavor.
meanings.sent4: His words were tincted with a hint of sarcasm.
meanings.sent5: The painting was tincted with vibrant strokes of blue and green.

meanings.definition: Having a slight trace or hint of something.
meanings.sent1: The air was tincted with the scent of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent2: His voice was tincted with a touch of uncertainty.
meanings.sent3: The room was tincted with a mysterious shadow in the corner.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was tincted with a touch of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere was tincted with an air of anticipation.
